commit.message:
re PR bootstrap/51006 (bootstrap fails on NetBSD 5.1)

2012-01-02  Jonathan Wakely  <jwakely.gcc@gmail.com>

	PR bootstrap/51006
	* enable-execute-stack-mprotect.c (getpagesize): Do not define
	for NetBSD.
